text: Christian Pläge (born 1 November 1956) is a Swiss equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Switzerland Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Christian Pläge
